==========

**EA003-250056 Water and Hydronic Piping Refit Design (CFIA Argentia, NL)**

Contract Number: #EA003-250056

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) hereby issue a Request for Proposal (RFP) for water and hydronic piping refit design in Argentia, Newfoundland and Labrador.

### Project Overview
Pursuant to the Mechanical and Electrical Engineering Services Supply Arrangement E0225-150564, PSPC invites selected suppliers to submit a proposal for the water and hydronic piping refit design in Argentia. The proposed project is intended to upgrade the existing piping system and design a new system to meet the agency's expanding needs.

### Key Documents
Please refer to the solicitation package for the following key documents:

*   Solicitation number: WS4607888266
*   Request for Proposal (RFP) document
*   Contracting Entity's Address
    *   Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
    *   11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   End User Entity's Address
    *   Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA)
    *   1400 Merivale Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0Y9, Canada

### Submission Information

*   Proposals will be accepted in either official language of Canada until the tender closing date and time (see notice).
*   Firms that have the necessary qualifications and experience are invited to submit proposals.

Please refer to the package for further details.

**Evaluation Criteria**

*   Firms will be evaluated on their combined technical merit and price.
*   The Contracting Authority will assess the proposals based on the supplier's technical capabilities, experience, and price responsiveness.

### Contact Information
*   If you have any questions or require further clarification, please contact: 
    *   Ms. Fesseha Nicole 
    *   Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) 
    *   Email: nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
